products: Softdel offers various products including softBAC for BACnet integration, SoftMOD for Modbus communication, SoftHART for HART protocol, SoftDMX for lighting control, EdificeEdge as an IoT gateway, EdificePlus as an enterprise platform, and a BACnet Simulator called BOSS.
services: Softdel provides customized software development, protocol stack integration, IoT solutions, and automation testing services.
about company: Softdel is a leading technology company specializing in IoT, smart building solutions, and protocol engineering.
contact us: You can reach us at contact@softdel.com or call us at +1-234-567-8900.
